nodes.text: The Week of Escape was a type of vacation to the planet Zeltros that was available in the era of the Galactic War and subsequent conflicts. Participants signed a standard non-disclosure contract before the vacation, preventing them from mentioning any of the events of the Week of Escape once they left Zeltros. It also had some spa-like features to it in order to help make participants feel more comfortable.
The Week of Escape was mentioned in the MMO Star Wars: The Old Republic in the item description of the Zeltronian "Week of Escape" Voucher, a companion gift obtainable from Alliance crates.
